description:
Manages a folder-level logging exclusion. For more information see:

* [API documentation](https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/reference/v2/rest/v2/folders.exclusions)
* How-to Guides
    * [Excluding Logs](https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/exclusions)

~> You can specify exclusions for log sinks created by terraform by using the exclusions field of `google_logging_folder_sink`

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Disabled.description:
Whether this exclusion rule should be disabled or not. This defaults to
false.

Filter.description:
The filter to apply when excluding logs. Only log entries that match the filter are excluded.
See [Advanced Log Filters](https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/view/advanced-filters) for information on how to
write a filter.

Folder.description:
The folder to be exported to the sink. Note that either [FOLDER_ID] or "folders/[FOLDER_ID]" is
accepted.

Name.description: The name of the logging exclusion.
